name: Will of Dermond
desc: $market is under control of The Federation of Dermond, it is their home, and their job is to protect this place, nobody will surrender without a fight.

name: Dermondian Marine Corp Presence
desc: Dermond Marince Corp is based on $market which increases the ground defense of the planet. The Marines are highly skilled which results in them fighting without fear.

name: Will of Dermond
desc: $market is not under control of The Federation of Dermond, it is their home and they will sabotage everything and refuse to follow your rules or follow your orders.

name: Slavery?
desc: $market is being suspected of having huge concentrations of slaves but nobody knows for sure is it true nowadays or not.
